description: This file defines an interface 'IZigWave' for ZigBee waveform management within the WPEFramework. It includes virtual functions for controlling device acceptance mode, querying device metadata, listing available devices, and managing device bindings.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: An interface for ZigBee waveform devices, enabling permission control, device info retrieval, device enumeration, and binding management.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Checks or sets whether a specific device address is allowed to permute (accept or reject new devices).

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific device by its ID.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the list of currently available devices.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Creates a binding between a source and a destination device.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Removes the binding between a source and a destination device.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
